cause.description:
we would like you to join our cause and donate(you dont have to but it would be nice if you) there are kids that are starving in africa and i think they need food and you could help with a small donation.
1. feed the starving children
2. help people with aids in 3rd world countries
3. give people lives they never had
cause.mission: get some money to those poor starving people in 3rd world africa
cause.name: Save Hungry children in Africa
